name: Easter Infestation
description:
Easter Infestation is a simple dungeon crawler running on Gameboy classic and Gameboy Color. You can use any Gameboy emulator or play it on a real Gameboy.

Example of emulator https://bgb.bircd.org/

The card I used during developpement to test the game on my Gameboy : https://www.ezflash.cn/product/ezflash-junior/

Commands:

A: action

B: Light/blow the torch

start: use a heal potion
